verses.verse: וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> came בִּשְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> both עֶשְׂרֵ֣ה <S%H6240><s%> ten שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> year בִּשְׁנֵי־ <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָׂ֥ר <S%H6240><s%> ten חֹ֖דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> in the twelfth month בְּאֶחָ֣ד <S%H259><s%> in the first לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> [day] of the month הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> [that] the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> Son אָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> of man שָׂ֤א <S%H5375><s%> take up קִינָה֙ <S%H7015><s%> a lamentation עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over פַּרְעֹ֣ה <S%H6547><s%> for Pharaoh מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> and say אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> to כְּפִ֥יר <S%H3715><s%> a young lion גּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> of the nations נִדְמֵ֑יתָ <S%H1819><s%> unto him Thou art like וְאַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> you כַּתַּנִּ֣ים <S%H8577><s%> the monster בַּיַּמִּ֔ים <S%H3220><s%> in the seas וַתָּ֣גַח <S%H1518><s%> and thou camest forth בְּנַהֲרוֹתֶ֗יךָ <S%H5104><s%> with thy rivers וַתִּדְלַח־ <S%H1804><s%> and troubledst מַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4325><s%> the waters בְּרַגְלֶ֔יךָ <S%H7272><s%> with thy feet וַתִּרְפֹּ֖ס <S%H7515><s%> and fouledst נַהֲרוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H5104><s%> their rivers

כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD וּפָרַשְׂתִּ֤י <S%H6566><s%> I will therefore spread out עָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5921><s%> over אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רִשְׁתִּ֔י <S%H7568><s%> my net בִּקְהַ֖ל <S%H6951><s%> over thee with a company עַמִּ֣ים <S%H5971><s%> people רַבִּ֑ים <S%H7227><s%> of many וְהֶעֱל֖וּךָ <S%H5927><s%> and they shall bring thee up בְּחֶרְמִֽי׃ <S%H2764><s%> in my net

וּנְטַשְׁתִּ֣יךָ <S%H5203><s%> Then will I leave בָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> thee upon the land עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> upon the open הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <S%H7704><s%> field אֲטִילֶ֑ךָ <S%H2904><s%> I will cast thee forth וְהִשְׁכַּנְתִּ֤י <S%H7931><s%> to remain עָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5921><s%> and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all ע֣וֹף <S%H5775><s%> and will cause all the fowls הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> of the heaven וְהִשְׂבַּעְתִּ֥י <S%H7646><s%> upon thee and I will fill מִמְּךָ֖ <S%H4480><s%> at חַיַּ֥ת <S%H2416><s%> the beasts כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of the whole הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the whole earth

וְנָתַתִּ֥י <S%H5414><s%> And I will lay אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּשָׂרְךָ֖ <S%H1320><s%> thy flesh עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הֶֽהָרִ֑ים <S%H2022><s%> upon the mountains וּמִלֵּאתִ֥י <S%H4390><s%> and fill הַגֵּאָי֖וֹת <S%H1516><s%> the valleys רָמוּתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H7419><s%> with thy height

וְהִשְׁקֵיתִ֨י <S%H8248><s%> I will also water אֶ֧רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land צָפָתְךָ֛ <S%H6824><s%> wherein thou swimmest מִדָּמְךָ֖ <S%H1818><s%> with thy blood אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> far הֶֽהָרִ֑ים <S%H2022><s%> [even] to the mountains וַאֲפִקִ֖ים <S%H650><s%> and the rivers יִמָּלְא֥וּן <S%H4390><s%> shall be full מִמֶּֽךָּ׃ <S%H4480><s%> at

וְכִסֵּיתִ֤י <S%H3680><s%> I will cover בְכַבּֽוֹתְךָ֙ <S%H3518><s%> And when I shall put thee out שָׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> the heaven וְהִקְדַּרְתִּ֖י <S%H6937><s%> thereof dark אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כֹּֽכְבֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H3556><s%> the stars שֶׁ֚מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> the sun בֶּעָנָ֣ן <S%H6051><s%> with a cloud אֲכַסֶּ֔נּוּ <S%H3680><s%> I will cover וְיָרֵ֖חַ <S%H3394><s%> and the moon לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> will not יָאִ֥יר <S%H215><s%> shall not give אוֹרֽוֹ׃ <S%H216><s%> her light

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All מְא֤וֹרֵי <S%H3974><s%> All the bright אוֹר֙ <S%H216><s%> lights בַּשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> of heaven אַקְדִּירֵ֖ם <S%H6937><s%> will I make dark עָלֶ֑יךָ <S%H5921><s%> over וְנָתַ֤תִּי <S%H5414><s%> over thee and set חֹ֙שֶׁךְ֙ <S%H2822><s%> darkness עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> over אַרְצְךָ֔ <S%H776><s%> upon thy land נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> GOD

וְהִ֨כְעַסְתִּ֔י <S%H3707><s%> I will also vex לֵ֖ב <S%H3820><s%> the hearts עַמִּ֣ים <S%H5971><s%> people רַבִּ֑ים <S%H7227><s%> of many בַּהֲבִיאִ֤י <S%H935><s%> when I shall bring שִׁבְרְךָ֙ <S%H7667><s%> thy destruction בַּגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> among the nations עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> into אֲרָצ֖וֹת <S%H776><s%> into the countries אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not יְדַעְתָּֽם׃ <S%H3045><s%> which thou hast not known

וַהֲשִׁמּוֹתִ֨י <S%H8074><s%> amazed עָלֶ֜יךָ <S%H5921><s%> and עַמִּ֣ים <S%H5971><s%> people רַבִּ֗ים <S%H7227><s%> Yea I will make many וּמַלְכֵיהֶם֙ <S%H4428><s%> at thee and their kings יִשְׂעֲר֤וּ <S%H8175><s%> afraid עָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5921><s%> and שַׂ֔עַר <S%H8178><s%> shall be horribly בְּעוֹפְפִ֥י <S%H5774><s%> for thee when I shall brandish חַרְבִּ֖י <S%H2719><s%> my sword עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> before פְּנֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H6440><s%> before them וְחָרְד֤וּ <S%H2729><s%> and they shall tremble לִרְגָעִים֙ <S%H7281><s%> at [every] moment אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man לְנַפְשׁ֔וֹ <S%H5315><s%> for his own life בְּי֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day מַפַּלְתֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H4658><s%> of thy fall ס

כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> For כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> For thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> GOD חֶ֥רֶב <S%H2719><s%> The sword מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> of the king בָּבֶ֖ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon תְּבוֹאֶֽךָ׃ <S%H935><s%> shall come

בְּחַרְב֤וֹת <S%H2719><s%> By the swords גִּבּוֹרִים֙ <S%H1368><s%> of the mighty אַפִּ֣יל <S%H5307><s%> to fall הֲמוֹנֶ֔ךָ <S%H1995><s%> will I cause thy multitude עָרִיצֵ֥י <S%H6184><s%> the terrible גוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> of the nations כֻּלָּ֑ם <S%H3605><s%> all וְשָֽׁדְדוּ֙ <S%H7703><s%> all of them and they shall spoil אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גְּא֣וֹן <S%H1347><s%> the pomp מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וְנִשְׁמַ֖ד <S%H8045><s%> thereof shall be destroyed כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הֲמוֹנָֽהּ׃ <S%H1995><s%> and all the multitude

וְהַֽאֲבַדְתִּי֙ <S%H6><s%> I will destroy אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בְּהֶמְתָּ֔הּ <S%H929><s%> also all the beasts מֵעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> thereof from מַ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> waters רַבִּ֑ים <S%H7227><s%> beside the great וְלֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> will not תִדְלָחֵ֤ם <S%H1804><s%> trouble רֶֽגֶל־ <S%H7272><s%> neither shall the foot אָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> of man ע֔וֹד <S%H5750><s%> anymore וּפַרְס֥וֹת <S%H6541><s%> them any more nor the hoofs בְּהֵמָ֖ה <S%H929><s%> of beasts לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> will not תִדְלָחֵֽם׃ <S%H1804><s%> trouble

אָ֚ז <S%H227><s%> Then אַשְׁקִ֣יעַ <S%H8257><s%> deep מֵֽימֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H4325><s%> Then will I make their waters וְנַהֲרוֹתָ֖ם <S%H5104><s%> and cause their rivers כַּשֶּׁ֣מֶן <S%H8081><s%> like oil אוֹלִ֑יךְ <S%H1980><s%> to run נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> GOD

בְּתִתִּי֩ <S%H5414><s%> When I shall make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶ֨רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land מִצְרַ֜יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt שְׁמָמָ֣ה <S%H8077><s%> desolate וּנְשַׁמָּ֗ה <S%H8074><s%> shall be destitute אֶ֚רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and the country מִמְּלֹאָ֔הּ <S%H4393><s%> of that whereof it was full בְּהַכּוֹתִ֖י <S%H5221><s%> when I shall smite אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all י֣וֹשְׁבֵי <S%H3427><s%> all them that dwell בָ֑הּ וְיָדְע֖וּ <S%H3045><s%> therein then shall they know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD

קִינָ֥ה <S%H6969><s%> wherewith they shall lament הִיא֙ <S%H1931><s%> This וְק֣וֹנְנ֔וּהָ <S%H7015><s%> This [is] the lamentation בְּנ֥וֹת <S%H1323><s%> her the daughters הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> of the nations תְּקוֹנֵ֣נָּה <S%H6969><s%> shall lament אוֹתָ֑הּ <S%H853><s%> עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> Over מִצְרַ֤יִם <S%H4714><s%> for her [even] for Egypt וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and over כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הֲמוֹנָהּ֙ <S%H1995><s%> and for all her multitude תְּקוֹנֵ֣נָּה <S%H6969><s%> her they shall lament אוֹתָ֔הּ <S%H853><s%> נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> GOD פ

וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> came בִּשְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> both עֶשְׂרֵ֣ה <S%H6240><s%> ten שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> year בַּחֲמִשָּׁ֥ה <S%H2568><s%> fif עָשָׂ֖ר <S%H6240><s%> teen לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> [day] of the month הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> [that] the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> Son אָדָ֕ם <S%H120><s%> of man נְהֵ֛ה <S%H5091><s%> wail עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for הֲמ֥וֹן <S%H1995><s%> for the multitude מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וְהוֹרִדֵ֑הוּ <S%H3381><s%> and cast them down א֠וֹתָהּ <S%H853><s%> וּבְנ֨וֹת <S%H1323><s%> [even] her and the daughters גּוֹיִ֧ם <S%H1471><s%> nations אַדִּרִ֛ם <S%H117><s%> of the famous אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth תַּחְתִּיּ֖וֹת <S%H8482><s%> unto the nether parts אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for י֥וֹרְדֵי <S%H3381><s%> with them that go down בֽוֹר׃ <S%H953><s%> into the pit

מִמִּ֖י <S%H4310><s%> Whom נָעָ֑מְתָּ <S%H5276><s%> Whom dost thou pass in beauty רְדָ֥ה <S%H3381><s%> ? go down וְהָשְׁכְּבָ֖ה <S%H7901><s%> and be thou laid אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with עֲרֵלִֽים׃ <S%H6189><s%> with the uncircumcised

בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst חַלְלֵי־ <S%H2491><s%> of [them that are] slain חֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> by the sword יִפֹּ֑לוּ <S%H5307><s%> They shall fall חֶ֣רֶב <S%H2719><s%> to the sword נִתָּ֔נָה <S%H5414><s%> she is delivered מָשְׁכ֥וּ <S%H4900><s%> draw אוֹתָ֖הּ <S%H853><s%> וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> her and all הֲמוֹנֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H1995><s%> her and all her multitudes

יְדַבְּרוּ־ <S%H1696><s%> shall speak ל֞וֹ אֵלֵ֧י <S%H410><s%> The strong גִבּוֹרִ֛ים <S%H1368><s%> among the mighty מִתּ֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> to him out of the midst שְׁא֖וֹל <S%H7585><s%> of hell אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> that עֹֽזְרָ֑יו <S%H5826><s%> with them that help יָֽרְד֛וּ <S%H3381><s%> him they are gone down שָׁכְב֥וּ <S%H7901><s%> they lie הָעֲרֵלִ֖ים <S%H6189><s%> uncircumcised חַלְלֵי־ <S%H2491><s%> slain חָֽרֶב׃ <S%H2719><s%> by the sword

שָׁ֤ם <S%H8033><s%> is there אַשּׁוּר֙ <S%H804><s%> Asshur וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all קְהָלָ֔הּ <S%H6951><s%> [is] there and all her company סְבִֽיבוֹתָ֖יו <S%H5439><s%> [are] about קִבְרֹתָ֑יו <S%H6913><s%> his graves כֻּלָּ֣ם <S%H3605><s%> her All חֲלָלִ֔ים <S%H2491><s%> him all of them slain הַנֹּפְלִ֖ים <S%H5307><s%> fallen בֶּחָֽרֶב׃ <S%H2719><s%> by the sword

אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> whose נִתְּנ֤וּ <S%H5414><s%> are set קִבְרֹתֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H6913><s%> Whose graves בְּיַרְכְּתֵי־ <S%H3411><s%> in the sides ב֔וֹר <S%H953><s%> of the pit וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> become קְהָלָ֔הּ <S%H6951><s%> and her company סְבִיב֖וֹת <S%H5439><s%> is round about קְבֻרָתָ֑הּ <S%H6900><s%> her grave כֻּלָּ֤ם <S%H3605><s%> All חֲלָלִים֙ <S%H2491><s%> all of them slain נֹפְלִ֣ים <S%H5307><s%> fallen בַּחֶ֔רֶב <S%H2719><s%> by the sword אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who נָתְנ֥וּ <S%H5414><s%> which caused חִתִּ֖ית <S%H2851><s%> terror בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land חַיִּֽים׃ <S%H2416><s%> of the living

שָׁ֤ם <S%H8033><s%> is there עֵילָם֙ <S%H5867><s%> There [is] Elam וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הֲמוֹנָ֔הּ <S%H1995><s%> and all her multitude סְבִיב֖וֹת <S%H5439><s%> round about קְבֻרָתָ֑הּ <S%H6900><s%> her grave כֻּלָּ֣ם <S%H3605><s%> all חֲלָלִים֩ <S%H2491><s%> all of them slain הַנֹּפְלִ֨ים <S%H5307><s%> fallen בַּחֶ֜רֶב <S%H2719><s%> by the sword אֲ‍ֽשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who יָרְד֥וּ <S%H3381><s%> which are gone down עֲרֵלִ֣ים ׀ <S%H6189><s%> uncircumcised אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> of אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth תַּחְתִּיּ֗וֹת <S%H8482><s%> into the nether parts אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who נָתְנ֤וּ <S%H5414><s%> which caused חִתִּיתָם֙ <S%H2851><s%> their terror בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land חַיִּ֔ים <S%H2416><s%> of the living וַיִּשְׂא֥וּ <S%H5375><s%> yet have they borne כְלִמָּתָ֖ם <S%H3639><s%> their shame אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for י֥וֹרְדֵי <S%H3381><s%> with them that go down בֽוֹר׃ <S%H953><s%> to the pit

בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst חֲ֠לָלִים <S%H2491><s%> of the slain נָתְנ֨וּ <S%H5414><s%> They have set מִשְׁכָּ֥ב <S%H4904><s%> her a bed לָהּ֙ בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הֲמוֹנָ֔הּ <S%H1995><s%> with all her multitude סְבִֽיבוֹתָ֖יו <S%H5439><s%> [are] round about קִבְרֹתֶ֑הָ <S%H6913><s%> her graves כֻּלָּ֣ם <S%H3605><s%> are all עֲרֵלִ֣ים <S%H6189><s%> him all of them uncircumcised חַלְלֵי־ <S%H2491><s%> slain חֶ֡רֶב <S%H2719><s%> by the sword כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> נִתַּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> was caused חִתִּיתָ֜ם <S%H2851><s%> though their terror בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land חַיִּ֗ים <S%H2416><s%> of the living וַיִּשְׂא֤וּ <S%H5375><s%> yet have they borne כְלִמָּתָם֙ <S%H3639><s%> their shame אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for י֣וֹרְדֵי <S%H3381><s%> with them that go down ב֔וֹר <S%H953><s%> to the pit בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst חֲלָלִ֖ים <S%H2491><s%> of [them that be] slain נִתָּֽן׃ <S%H5414><s%> he is put

שָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> are there מֶ֤שֶׁךְ <S%H4902><s%> There [is] Meshech תֻּבַל֙ <S%H8422><s%> Tubal וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הֲמוֹנָ֔הּ <S%H1995><s%> and all her multitude סְבִֽיבוֹתָ֖יו <S%H5439><s%> [are] round about קִבְרוֹתֶ֑יהָ <S%H6913><s%> her graves כֻּלָּ֤ם <S%H3605><s%> All עֲרֵלִים֙ <S%H6189><s%> him all of them uncircumcised מְחֻ֣לְלֵי <S%H2490><s%> slain חֶ֔רֶב <S%H2719><s%> by the sword כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> though נָתְנ֥וּ <S%H5414><s%> though they caused חִתִּיתָ֖ם <S%H2851><s%> their terror בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land חַיִּֽים׃ <S%H2416><s%> of the living

וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> Nor יִשְׁכְּבוּ֙ <S%H7901><s%> And they shall not lie אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> beside גִּבּוֹרִ֔ים <S%H1368><s%> with the mighty נֹפְלִ֖ים <S%H5307><s%> [that are] fallen מֵעֲרֵלִ֑ים <S%H6189><s%> of the uncircumcised אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who יָרְדֽוּ־ <S%H3381><s%> which are gone down שְׁא֣וֹל <S%H7585><s%> to hell בִּכְלֵֽי־ <S%H3627><s%> with their weapons מִלְחַמְתָּם֩ <S%H4421><s%> of war וַיִּתְּנ֨וּ <S%H5414><s%> and they have laid אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חַרְבוֹתָ֜ם <S%H2719><s%> their swords תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> under רָאשֵׁיהֶ֗ם <S%H7218><s%> under their heads וַתְּהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> rested עֲוֹֽנֹתָם֙ <S%H5771><s%> but their iniquities עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on עַצְמוֹתָ֔ם <S%H6106><s%> shall be upon their bones כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> though חִתִּ֥ית <S%H2851><s%> though [they were] the terror גִּבּוֹרִ֖ים <S%H1368><s%> of the mighty בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land חַיִּֽים׃ <S%H2416><s%> of the living

וְאַתָּ֗ה <S%H859><s%> in בְּת֧וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst עֲרֵלִ֛ים <S%H6189><s%> of the uncircumcised תִּשָּׁבַ֥ר <S%H7665><s%> Yea thou shalt be broken וְתִשְׁכַּ֖ב <S%H7901><s%> and shalt lie אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for חַלְלֵי־ <S%H2491><s%> with [them that are] slain חָֽרֶב׃ <S%H2719><s%> with the sword

שָׁ֣מָּה <S%H8033><s%> There אֱד֗וֹם <S%H123><s%> There [is] Edom מְלָכֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H4428><s%> her kings וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all נְשִׂיאֶ֔יהָ <S%H5387><s%> and all her princes אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who נִתְּנ֥וּ <S%H5414><s%> are laid בִגְבוּרָתָ֖ם <S%H1369><s%> which with their might אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for חַלְלֵי־ <S%H2491><s%> by [them that were] slain חָ֑רֶב <S%H2719><s%> by the sword הֵ֛מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with עֲרֵלִ֥ים <S%H6189><s%> with the uncircumcised יִשְׁכָּ֖בוּ <S%H7901><s%> they shall lie וְאֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for יֹ֥רְדֵי <S%H3381><s%> and with them that go down בֽוֹר׃ <S%H953><s%> to the pit

שָׁ֣מָּה <S%H8033><s%> There נְסִיכֵ֥י <S%H5257><s%> There [be] the princes צָפ֛וֹן <S%H6828><s%> of the north כֻּלָּ֖ם <S%H3605><s%> all וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all צִֽדֹנִ֑י <S%H6722><s%> all of them and all the Zidonians אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who יָרְד֣וּ <S%H3381><s%> which are gone down אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with חֲלָלִ֗ים <S%H2491><s%> with the slain בְּחִתִּיתָ֤ם <S%H2851><s%> with their terror מִגְבֽוּרָתָם֙ <S%H1369><s%> of their might בּוֹשִׁ֔ים <S%H954><s%> they are ashamed וַיִּשְׁכְּב֤וּ <S%H7901><s%> and they lie עֲרֵלִים֙ <S%H6189><s%> uncircumcised אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for חַלְלֵי־ <S%H2491><s%> with [them that be] slain חֶ֔רֶב <S%H2719><s%> by the sword וַיִּשְׂא֥וּ <S%H5375><s%> and bear כְלִמָּתָ֖ם <S%H3639><s%> their shame אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for י֥וֹרְדֵי <S%H3381><s%> with them that go down בֽוֹר׃ <S%H953><s%> to the pit

אוֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> יִרְאֶ֣ה <S%H7200><s%> shall see פַרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> Pharaoh וְנִחַ֖ם <S%H5162><s%> them and shall be comforted עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all [הֲמֹונֹה כ] (הֲמֹונֹ֑ו <S%H1995><s%> abundance ק) חַלְלֵי־ <S%H2491><s%> slain חֶ֙רֶב֙ <S%H2719><s%> by the sword פַּרְעֹ֣ה <S%H6547><s%> [even] Pharaoh וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all חֵיל֔וֹ <S%H2428><s%> and all his army נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> GOD

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Though נָתַ֥תִּי <S%H5414><s%> For I have caused אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> [חִתִּיתֹו כ] (חִתִּיתִ֖י <S%H2851><s%> terror ק) בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land חַיִּ֑ים <S%H2416><s%> of the living וְהֻשְׁכַּב֩ <S%H7901><s%> and he shall be laid בְּת֨וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst עֲרֵלִ֜ים <S%H6189><s%> of the uncircumcised אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for חַלְלֵי־ <S%H2491><s%> with [them that are] slain חֶ֗רֶב <S%H2719><s%> with the sword פַּרְעֹה֙ <S%H6547><s%> [even] Pharaoh וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הֲמוֹנֹ֔ה <S%H1995><s%> and all his multitude נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> GOD פ
